definition: insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
(bird species of China) lemon-rumped warbler (Phylloscopus chloronotus)

sentences.english: Descriptions from that era describe ripe watermelons as having a yellowish interior.
sentences.chinese: 那個時代對成熟西瓜的描述是擁有淡黃色的內瓤。

sentences.english: It's aroma refreshing, light yellow liquor color, taste comfortable it is best in white tea.
sentences.chinese: 其香氣清新，湯色淡黃，滋味鮮爽，是白茶中的極品。

sentences.english: One afternoon someone noticed a slight yellowish-brown tint in the spring .
sentences.chinese: 一個下午某人在春天注意了輕微的淡黃棕色的色彩。

sentences.english: To why protect the student's eyesight to use flaxen paper?
sentences.chinese: 爲了保護學生的視力爲何採用淡黃色的紙？

sentences.english: The chloroplast envelope has the light yellow color of violaxanthin.
sentences.chinese: 葉綠體的套膜有紫黃質的淡黃色。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated hair clip with Jonquil crystal lemon and leaf in Peridot crystal.
sentences.chinese: 淡黃色的水晶檸檬配橄欖色的葉子，金屬部分鍍銠。

sentences.english: A wheater vane crowns the building.
sentences.chinese: 淡黃色的風信旗加頂於建築物。

sentences.english: My lighter are flaxen and transparent.
sentences.chinese: 我的打火機是淡黃色的和透明的。

sentences.english: He's called Ginger' because of his bright ginger hair.
sentences.chinese: 他長着一頭淡黃色的頭髮，因而被人叫做“黃毛”。

sentences.english: Pale yellow with green lights. Firm with green apple and lemon flavors. Spicy notes on the finish.
sentences.chinese: 色澤淡黃泛青，口感呈蘋果和檸檬香，回味濃烈。

sentences.english: Morning came slowly with a pale yellow light.
sentences.chinese: 在淡黃色的辰光中早晨姍姍來遲。

sentences.english: Folic acid is a yellowish to orange, crystalline powder; odourless or almost odourless.
sentences.chinese: 葉酸是淡黃色至橙色結晶粉沫，無臭或幾乎無臭。

sentences.english: Fruit pyriform; leaf blade abaxially densely gray or yellowish gray tomentose.
sentences.chinese: 果梨形葉片背面濃密灰色的或淡黃灰色被絨毛。

sentences.english: On colour, white metope can hang shallow brown or flaxen picture frame.
sentences.chinese: 在色彩上，白色牆面可掛淺棕色或淡黃色鏡框。
媽咪喜愛淡黃色的水仙花。
可以搭配不透明的淡黃色。

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
Jiguan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
